item.title: NicePlayer 0.96.2 Preview (v581)
item.description:
Version 0.96.2 Preview (v581)
• Fix for PPC bug introduced 579.
• Fix for lack of folder expansion when dragging directly to the playlist

Help Request for Previewers:
• Any show stopping bugs, this is a release candidate.

item.title: NicePlayer 0.96.2 Preview (v579)
item.description:
Version 0.96.2 Preview (v579)
• QuickLook support for mkv and divx file extensions
• m4v file extension document association added.

Help Request for Previewers:
• Report NicePlayer bugs in relation to QuickLook and Document Associations
• Report NicePlayer bugs in 10.5.3
• Report NicePlayer in relation to 10.4 compatibility with this preview.

item.title: NicePlayer 0.96.2 Preview (v577)
item.description:
Version 0.96.2 Preview (v577)
• NicePlayer Apple Remote code has been updated for Leopard

Help Request for Previewers:
• Report NicePlayer bugs in relation to Spaces with this preview.
• Report NicePlayer bugs in relation to Apple Remote control.
• Report NicePlayer in relation to 10.4 compatibility with this preview.

item.title: NicePlayer 0.96.2 Preview (v575)
item.description:
Version 0.96.2 Preview (v575)
• NicePlayer can now be set on every screen in Leopard Spaces

Help Request for Previewers:
• Report NicePlayer bugs in relation to Spaces with this preview.
• Report NicePlayer in relation to 10.4 compatibility with this preview.
